Title: For Those Who Think Young
Plot: It?s Valentine?s Day, and the Sterling Cooper advertising agency is hustling to stay on top of its game and buzzing over the newest office equipment. Don and Duck find themselves at odds over an account. Betty reconnects with an old friend and once again finds herself struggling with car trouble.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
